attributes.action:
Refund University Education Disruption- 
Due to Covid and now Strike Action!
attributes.background: For the last 3 years students education has been trampled on for all different causes. This is not what we signed up for and is completely unfair we deserve a refund for the sake of these awful disruptions in the course of our degree

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609412
